topic.title: Overview
topic.shortdesc: The Overview tab on the Inventory Detail page summarizes core details about a host object.

body.p: The following items are included in the summary:

li.p: host name, personality, and the internal UUID and host ID reference numbers
MAC and IP addresses on the internal management network
serial ID, if known. Use the command system host-modify <hostname> serialid=xxx to update it.
location, as entered by the operator using the Edit Host window (see )
time stamps of when the host was created and last updated
board management (iLO) information, if available, including controller type, MAC address, and IP address.
